title: Cathie Wood's ARK Invest Sells Coinbase Shares for First Time in a Month
description: ARK sold $34.3 million of shares in the crypto exchange, which is due to report earnings after the U.S. market closes.

title: ARK dumps first Coinbase and Robinhood shares since January
description:
Spot Bitcoin ETF issuer ARK Invest sold $34 million in Coinbase shares amid the stock breaking new highs in 2024.

ARK Invest — one of the issuers of a spot Bitcoin (BTC) exchange-traded fund (ETF) in the United States — has sold some major cryptocurrency-related stocks for the first time this year.

On Feb. 14, ARK dumped 214,068 Coinbase (COIN) shares and 119,394 Robinhood (HOOD) shares from its ETFs, according to a trade notification seen by Cointelegraph.

The trading firm offloaded 152,600 Coinbase shares from the ARK Innovation ETF (ARKK) alone, with an additional 31,459 and 30,009 being sold by the ARK Fintech Innovation ETF (ARKF) and the ARK Next Generation Internet ETF (ARKW), respectively. The entire sale netted $34 million, based on Coinbase's closing price of $160.4 on Wednesday, according to TradingView.

Read more

title: OpenAI and Microsoft join forces to thwart state-linked cyberattacks
description:
While OpenAI and Microsoft effectively prevented these occurrences, they acknowledged the challenge of avoiding every cyberattack.

OpenAI, the developer behind ChatGPT, has collaborated with its top investor, Microsoft, to prevent five cyberattacks linked to different states.

According to a report released on Wednesday, Microsoft monitored hacking groups linked to Russian military intelligence, Iran’s Revolutionary Guard, and the Chinese and North Korean governments as they aimed to refine their hacking strategies using large language models (LLMs).

LLMs are computer programs — commonly referred to as artificial intelligence (AI) — that utilize vast text data sets to create responses that sound human-like.

Read more

title: BlackRock and Fidelity lead as Bitcoin ETFs capture $340 million in a single day
